title.narrative: Increasing member access to financial services.

description.narrative:
Increasing member access to financial services in Lyamujungu will be a project of one year. It will build on the already existing interventions the focus will be on;

1. Updating the strategic plan

2. Training the board and management on the new strategy

3. Training the board and management on credit management

4. Youth and board exchange

The above activities shall be done through a combination of tools including use of consultants agripool peer to peer and BA time.


The result expected is increase in member participation and strong internal processes that will respond to member needs.

Lyamujungu Savings and credit cooperative desires to increase member financial inclusion. Through access to reliable credit savings and other financial investment opportunities specifically for women and youth. Management is eager to improve establish a strategic direction that enables sustainable and efficient utilisation of resources. With productivity and monitoring of human resources the SACCO aims at increasing service delivery.

This will be achieved through updating a business plan training board and management on credit management and youth involvement in business ventures.
The major goal is to increase member access to financial services.
